entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.

text: @thatRamosgirl Stupid, ill informed woman! Look at Australia. Forewarned to keep Covid-19 at bay, 70 deaths nationally to date. Still too many but better than many other countries. We're all housebound, 14 day lockdown for all people coming into the country. Yesterday 1 new case in our state.
